weka.clusterers

Class AntGridClusterer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.AbstractClusterer
      • weka.clusterers.AbstractAntGridClusterer
        • weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.clusterers.Clusterer, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class AntGridClusterer
extends AbstractAntGridClusterer
    Clusterer to name instance groups, produced by an ant cluster algorithm on a grid. It first tries to find related instances by their neighborhoods on the grid and then, if there is a maximum cluster number given, join similar groups to match that number. Valid options are: 

     -di
  Search also at grid cells diagonal to the current cell for instances of the
  same cluster. If false only instances at the grid cells above, below, left
  and right around the current grid cell are added to the cluster. If set to
  true, also instances at diagonal positions are added to the cluster.
     -jw <num>
  Size of the surrounding area around a single instance in which clusters are
  searched. If there is only one cluster type found in this area, a single
  instance is automatically added to this cluster, if the cluster contains
  more than one instance. Usually single instances in direct neighborhood to
  one cluster belong to this cluster.
     -maxcluster <num>
  If there are more clusters found than allowed by this setting, clusters must
  be merged to match this value. Set to -1 to not merge clusters.
     -comp <type>
  This setting specifies how clusters are compared. Clusters that are regarded
  as most similar by this comparison method are merged until the requirement
  of maximum number of clusters in the result is met.
     -dist <classname and options>
  Distance function that is used for instance comparison according to the
  attributes of the instances.
  (default = weka.core.EuclideanDistance)
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    Christoph
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  AntGridClusterer.Cluster
      This is the cluster that can be assigned to the AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder objects.
      protected class  AntGridClusterer.ClusterComparator
      Compares two clusters and indicate their similarity by a double value.
      protected class  AntGridClusterer.Coordinate
      Coordinate in an imaginary two-dimensional coordinate system.
      protected class  AntGridClusterer.GridSurface
      A surface to reflect the positions of the instances on the grid.
      protected class  AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder
      Placeholder for a Instance object that can be managed on the grid.

        protected int optn_clusterCompareMode
        Compare mode to use for cluster comparison.

        In the current implementation there is only one cluster compare mode available. This setting is here to give the user a choice later, if more are added.

      • indexOfInstanceInInstances

        protected static int indexOfInstanceInInstances(weka.core.Instances instances,
                                                weka.core.Instance instance)
        Tells the index of an Instance object in a Instances object.

        This is an alternative method for the instances.indexOf(instance) task, but does not use the instance.equals(Object obj) invoked by instances.indexOf(instance). For the context this method is used in, the instances.indexOf(instance) did not work as desired, so this method was written. If there is a way to execute also indexOf, this method becomes obsolete.

        Parameters:
        instances - Instances to search in
        instance - the Instance to search for in instances
        Returns:
        index of instance in instances or -1 if instance was not found.
